title: Prestigious Super Luxury Apartment (SHANGRI-LA)
details: We Are Proud To Be Associated With The Most Prestegious Apartment Complex Being Built In Sri Lanka, Shangri-la.. The Project Comprises Of Two Residential Towers, An Office Complex And A State Of Art Mall. The two residential towers Comprise of Two Bed Roomed, three bedroomed & four Bed Roomed Units With State Of Art Facilities. Last Few Units Available. Prices Range From Us$ 850,000 To Us$ 1,600,000. We Could Offer You A Good Payment Plan And Banking Facilities. Handover will be end of 2018.. For expats, foreign nationals & dual citizenship holders, our legal services will give you a full service, such opening up bank accounts and transferring funds into Sri Lanka.
